**The Supreme Clarity Jade Emperor’s Seven Sages Mysterious Record of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven Scripture**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Jade Emperor’s Seven Sages Mysterious Record of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven Scripture* (abbreviated as *The Seven Sages Mysterious Record*).
Author unknown, approximately composed during the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Supreme Clarity tradition. One fascicle.
Base text from: *Daoist Canon of the Orthodox Unity Tradition*, Section Zheng Yi.

---

**The Supreme Clarity Jade Emperor’s Seven Sages Mysterious Record of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven Upper Scripture**

This is the *Upper Scripture of the Jade Emperor’s Seven Sages Mysterious Record of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven*, wherein the Supreme Sage Emperor Lord established the inception of the Nine Mysteries’ primordial *qi*. The Void and Numinous divided, the Two Modes became manifest, the Nine Origins harmonized in resonance, and the Nine Emperors commanded the spirits, all converging in the Radiant Rosy Palace of the Nine Heavens.

Thereupon, the Supreme Sage, in accord with the Jade Void and Purple Guest, returned to the Cinnabar Rosy Wheel of the Nine Heavens, ascending the Nine-Tiered, Sevenfold-Luminous Crimson Palace. They wandered above the Bright Clouds, traversing the desolate expanse of the Nine Voids. The Heavenly Origin lay in profound stillness; the Three Luminaries merged their radiance. Flowing essence illuminated the Void; the Eight Assemblies and Four Convergences intermingled in perfect union. They chanted and intoned the Great Nothingness, and the Mysterious Beginning shone forth in clarity. The celestial scenes unfolded in splendor; rivers and seas stilled their waves. The Eight Winds turned their wheels; drifting mists gathered at the Dragon’s Terrace. Floating light spread across the Nine Mysteries; Golden Immortals wielded their halberds, while the Four Directors bore their banners. The Five Thearchs’ spirit-officials, ten billion in number, soared on winged unicorns to guard the Heavenly Perfected.

The Western Florescence Jade Maidens and Golden Dawn Spirit Lads displayed their cloud-like grace beside the jasper halls, their immortal countenances concealed within the orchid chambers. They scattered numinous incense to dispel impurities and raised refined essence with their dusters. Dragons coursed in pairs through the Purple Palace; venomous beasts brandished their claws at the Jade Gates. Golden-winged birds preened their feathers in the jasper groves; spirit cranes soared and sang amid the clouds.

The Western Consorts struck the rhythm; Heavenly Maidens arrayed their chimes. Dragons roared and tigers howled; phoenixes danced and simurghs sang. The Four Perfected harmonized their voices; the Eight Sounds rang in unison. Cloud zithers resounded brightly, startling the Three Clarities. Soaring songs and mysterious melodies filled the vast celestial court. Fragrance wafted through the misty clouds; numinous winds dispersed the true essence. Radiant light intertwined; the Three Candles merged their brilliance.

At this time, the Most High Supreme Lord of the Great Dao donned a robe of nine-colored parted silk, clad in a gown woven with frost-like pearls. His cap transformed in an instant; his sash bore the Morning Light Sun Bell and the Life-Extending Sword. The Falling and Interlacing Sash displayed the Jade Seal and Phoenix Insignia. Flowing gold illuminated the Void; the Seven Essences surged without bound. He rode the Ninefold Numinous, Eightfold Luminous, cloud-borne chariot of azure mist. Following him were three hundred thousand flying immortals beneath feathered canopies of the Mulberry Grove, along with the Purple Void Lads. Their canopies unfurled across the Nine Clouds, turning the heavens and inclining the light. Heavenly Soldiers led the way; the Six Masters brandished their blades. Lightning bolts flashed and essence flared; the Four Illuminations upheld the numinous path. The Five Elders opened the celestial ford; flying banners lined the jasper roads. Their gazes swept the lofty clarity as they ascended to the Nine-Tiered, Sevenfold-Luminous Crimson Palace.

The Dao Lord took his seat; the Nine Emperors rejoiced in unison. The Three Perfected harmonized their resonance; the Seven Sages shared in delight. Heavenly music rang clear; the Supreme Sage exulted. His mysterious heart filled the Emperor’s tablets; soaring brushstrokes flourished amid the celebratory mists. The spirits thrived in harmony; virtue and emptiness embodied the Mysterious. Dragon patterns gleamed upon the azure abyss; colorful clouds blazed across the Nine Heavens. His lofty visage was bathed in orchid and jade; golden essence emanated from the jasper springs. The Seven Records were inscribed in the Upper Register; the hidden chapters were etched with luminous script. They gathered and bound the submerged brushstrokes, turning the stagnant wheels, weaving together the Five Symbols, and assembling the Supreme Perfected. This was the lofty transmission of the Most High, spreading teachings to all directions.

Thereupon, the Seven Sages composed the chapters of the Supreme Mystery, compiling them into numinous texts. The Turtle Mother wielded the brush; the Great One swept the mat. Heavenly Consorts attended with incense; Jade Florescence held the towels. Cinnabar script in purple characters was engraved upon white silver, its hidden numinous resonance bound within the jade chapters. The names of those who attained the Dao were inscribed in green records and entrusted to the Five Elders, the Left Duke of the Immortal Capital. They were stored in the Purple Stamen Jade Case, sealed with the Seal of Command. Three hundred Jade Lads and Maidens each scattered flowers to attend the numinous. The Seven Sages each held a copy; the Western Turtle fixed the records, and the Eastern Florescence verified the names, summoning the immortals of the Five Peaks.

For later learners who present petitions to the Three Origins and offer records to the Azure Palace, undergoing seven selections in a year, those whose names are listed in the Supreme Clarity shall be inscribed upon the Mysterious Chart and become Perfected Ones of the Great Peace.

This is the celestial sincerity and mysterious harmony of the Supreme Sages, where luminous virtue unites with the Three Origins. Thus, the Most High issued his decree, recording it in jade script. The Mysterious Accord resounded in hidden song; the radiance of the heavens shone within. The profound and distant resonance of the Cavern Mystery turned in accord with the Mysterious. The lofty model transcended the Three Realms; the cinnabar light soared above the Supreme Perfected. Those who succeeded were inscribed upon the White Tablets and their names bound in the Green Records. The mysterious chart is lofty and wondrous, beyond the expression of brush and ink. This is but a rough sketch of one thousandth part, a brief outline of the distant traces of those who attained the true.

The *White Tablets and Green Records of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven* were received by the Supreme Sage Emperor Lords from the Nine Voids. They bound the characters of the soaring mysterious purple *qi*, naturally formed, recording the names of later learners who attained the Dao. The numinous sounds harmonized in resonance; jade clarity upheld the true. Some were expressed in written form, others in hidden tones. The Four Convergences above and below all signified the empty birth of the mysterious names, inscribed within the Hall of Vast Numinosity.

The ancient text contained one hundred thousand jade words, their forms without fixed type, their rhymes without fixed sound. None but the Supreme Sages could fathom their meaning. After seven thousand years, they were inscribed within the northern cavern of the Kunlun Chambers. Each character measured a *zhang* in size; the text blazed with resplendent brilliance. The four directions emitted radiance; empty mists arose, now present, now absent. Flowing light and purple *qi* dispelled impurities; golden essence refined and polished the script. Through countless kalpas, the characters remained fresh and bright.

In the first year of the Middle August era, on the seventh day of the ninth month, the Seven Sages united their numinous powers. They purified themselves in the Long Palace, swearing oaths to the golden and azure heavens, pledging their reverence. They received the numinous text. The Most High resolved its obstructions; the Seven Sages comprehended its wondrous sounds. They recorded it as the *Scripture of the Nine Heavens’ Return to Heaven for Attaining the Dao*, inscribed upon white silver tablets, bound with soaring green script. It was stored in a cloud-brocade pouch, sealed with the Seal of Command, and entrusted to the Left Duke of the Five Elders’ Immortal Capital, to be safeguarded in the Jasper Palace.

Pursuant to the *Luminous Statutes of the Four Poles*, this scripture is transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. It is examined by the laws of the Four Offices and enforced by the divine soldiers of the Five Emperors. Only those whose names are inscribed upon the Mystic Register may receive this text. Should any recipient recklessly divulge it, calamity shall annihilate nine generations; their sevenfold spirit shall endure eternal torment, their own life forfeit, and they shall be bound in long servitude to the ghostly officials. Though their name may be recorded in the Mystic Register, they shall never ascend as immortals.

The *Mystic Chronicle of the Seven Sages’ Return to Heaven* is composed in verses that harmonize, its branches and categories interwoven, its characters formed through the convergence of upper and lower elements, or marked by their proper taboo names. Some are single, some compound, all emerging from the primordial caverns of the Mystic Antiquity, compiled by the Most High Sages to elucidate the numinous script. Later scholars whose names are inscribed within its chapters and who receive its precious instructions shall naturally ascend as immortals.

Yet there are the Six Harmonies and the Seven Harms: treasure this text, and they align; neglect it, and they vanish. Those destined for this path must exert utmost sincerity, observe prolonged fasts upon sacred mounds, seek out secluded mountains, burn incense and perform rites, recite the scripture morning and evening, cast aside all distracting thoughts, and fix their minds upon the Supreme Perfection. Only then may they attain the descent of the Mystic, ascending in broad daylight to soar through the heavens.

Among later scholars, some whose names are not inscribed upon the Mystic Register yet obtain the precious scripture—these possess profound virtue from past lives, their boughs casting shade upon their descendants, or they have accrued hidden merit, their aspirations surpassing the multitude. With single-minded devotion and arduous practice, they move the Jade Emperor; the Four Poles bear witness, the Five Peaks record their names, and they encounter a master who bestows the precious text. Should they practice with diligence and avoid the Seven Harms, a Perfected One shall descend to transmit the true scripture, inscribing their name in the Mystic Chronicle. In seven years, they too shall attain immortality.

All who behold the *Mystic Chronicle of the Most High Sages* possess names destined for immortal flight, their names engraved upon the image of their future lives, inscribed in reverse upon the scrolls of the Mystic Void. Having received the human Dao, their names are selected by the Azure Palace, protected by the Four Offices, expounded by the Five Emperors, concealed within the Jade Void, and rooted in the Purple Web. Their bones bear wondrous radiance, their entire form harmonizing with the immortal realm. The Four Offices descend in secret, bestowing the precious text in darkness. The Supreme Unity fixes their register; the Director of Destinies grants them years. Their souls are steadfast, their spirits at peace, their six viscera congealing the true, and the myriad spirits fully assembled—thus they attain the rank of Supreme Immortal. After seven years of cultivation, the numinous shall descend of itself, and they shall ride the void to ascend in flight.

The Most High Sage Emperor declares: All who receive the *Mystic Chronicle of the Seven Sages’ Return to the Nine Heavens*, though they have not yet ascended, shall have their names selected by the Azure Palace and reported to the Five Peaks, entrusted to the officials of the sacred mountains, rivers, and seas for their protection. Twelve Jade Lads and twelve Jade Maidens shall attend them, safeguarding the numinous script and serving the scripture in their practice of the true. This Mystic Destiny aligns with the natural order; the Most High Sages inscribe it in reverse upon the True Register, their positions commensurate with those of immortal ministers. When their Dao is complete, the Four Perfected shall visit their chambers, and a cloud chariot shall descend, enabling their ascent in broad daylight. The standards of ascent and the ranks of immortality shall be conferred according to their merit.

This Dao is profound and subtle, not to be glimpsed or heard through ordinary study. Those who receive it must treasure and conceal it; guard against reckless disclosure.

---

**The Hidden Statutes of the Six Harmonies for Inscribing Names in the Mystic Register and Ascending as Immortals**
The Most High Sage Emperor declares: On the first day of the first month, the third day of the third month, the fifth day of the fifth month, the seventh day of the seventh month, the ninth day of the ninth month, and the eleventh day of the eleventh month—these six days of the year are the times when the Celestial Virtue aligns in harmony. The Seven Sages fix the register, the Five Emperors record names, the Western Tortoise inscribes the record, and the Eastern Florescence compiles the scroll.

On these days, the Primordial Celestial Unity converges in celebration. The Four Offices array their soldiers, the Most High displays their canopy, the Jade Void revolves in paired ranks, the Nine Emperors gird their sashes, the Seven Sages unite their numinous powers, and the myriad Perfected Ones and ten thousand immortals all ascend to the Golden Court. The Three Mornings flank the imperial chariot, the Seven Origins blaze with radiance, heaven and earth are purified, and the Ten Realms stand in solemn clarity. The Nine Heavenly Emperor-Kings dispatch the Inspectors of Perfected Ones; the Most High Seven Sages send the Left Immortal of the Fixed Register; the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise commands the Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Central Perfected of the Western Radiance; the Azure Lad of the Eastern Florescence dispatches the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals. Each division of flying immortals and wheel-borne feathered riders patrols the Ten Heavens and the Five Peaks’ sacred mountains, secretly observing the Cavern Primordials who have already attained the Dao, the wandering immortal officials, and later scholars whose names are inscribed in the register but who have not yet ascended, or whose names are absent from the Mystic Chronicle yet practice with arduous devotion, their sincerity surpassing that of the Jade Void, moving the Jade Emperor.

On these days, those who study the Dao must purify themselves in fasting, burn incense, cast aside all distracting thoughts, align their wishes with the celestial will, concentrate their minds in earnest contemplation, and cultivate the numinous script. If the Five Emperors commend them, their names shall be inscribed upon the White Register and recorded in the Plain Record. The Four Poles shall then descend to bestow the Supreme Perfection, and in seven years, they shall ride the void and ascend to the dawn heavens.

On these days, should any treat the celestial treasure with disdain, leak the Mystic Script, or incur the Seven Harms, they shall be seized by the Four Offices. Those whose names are inscribed upon the White Register shall have their names struck from the Azure Record and reassigned to the ghostly officials. Those without prior inscription in the register who encounter the scripture by karmic affinity shall be punished by the Five Emperors with divine soldiers, their seven ancestors seized and condemned to the trials of the River Source’s life-and-death reckoning, as evident as the brightness of the sun.

Thus, cultivation depends on the sincerity of the heart, not merely upon having one’s name inscribed in the White Register or the Mystic Chronicle. Only through secrecy and arduous devotion may one attain immortality.

The Most High Jade Emperor Dao Lord declares: To inscribe one’s name in the White Register and the Mystic Chronicle and ascend to the Jade Clarity’s Upper Palace, one must, at the time of the first day of the first month’s celestial convergence, bathe and purify oneself in fasting. At dawn, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times to the north, paying homage to the Jade Emperor. After completing the rites, sit facing north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the chamber filled with luxuriant blue clouds enveloping the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the blue clouds, clad in soaring azure feathered robes, crowned with jade diadems that reach the heavens, each holding a register inscribed in blue script. Visualize the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals wearing a cloud-brocade robe, crowned with a seven-jeweled jade coronet, and holding a white silver tablet.

Envision the Two Perfected Ones inscribing my name upon the tablet, binding my record within the azure-cloud register, and presenting my inscribed tablet to the Overseer of Perfected Beings and the Left Scribe of Destined Records. Let it be submitted to the celestial thrones of the Nine Heavens’ Emperor-Kings and the Seven Sages below, where my name shall be fixed in the register. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals then dissolve into the Hall of Luminosity within my body. Proceed to intone the prayer:

"On this day of celestial convergence, the Primordial Heaven stands in solemn clarity. The Exalted Canopy of the Highest shines forth as the Jade Emperor descends to the court. The Nine Perfected command the Void; the Seven Sages unite in numinous power. Above, the Mystic Register is examined; my name is inscribed upon the white tablet, engraved into the Primordial Record. The dead are erased; the living are etched. The Western Tortoise binds the scroll; the Azure Florescence of Immortality is preserved. Above, I receive the cap and sash; the Five Forms are radiantly transformed. Feathered robes are bestowed upon me; a green chariot descends. I ascend upon soaring clouds, mounting the Purple Jade. The Three Radiances merge their light; the Seven Origins share their brilliance. I eternally safeguard the Two Modes, Heaven and Earth enduring as one."

Upon completion, bow seven times to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths of qi to conclude.

This is the method of the Highest Sacred Scripture for inscribing and submitting one’s name to the Six Harmonies. Practicing it for seven years, even those without a prior name in the Mystic Register shall have their names engraved therein. The Three Origins descend; the Four Poles awaken their numinosity. Naturally, one attains penetrating clarity and ascends in flight to the Grand Clarity.

The Highest Sacred Emperor-Lord states: The method for inscribing one’s name upon the Mystic Tablet and ascending in body to the Upper Clarity is as follows. At the time of celestial convergence on the third day of the third month, bathe and purify oneself in fasting. At the hour of the meal, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times to the north, paying homage to the Jade Heaven. After completing the rites, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the chamber filled with luxuriant purple clouds enveloping the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the purple clouds, clad in soaring azure feathered robes, crowned with jade diadems that reach the heavens, each holding a register inscribed in blue script. Visualize the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals wearing a cloud-brocade robe, crowned with a seven-jeweled jade coronet, and holding a white tablet.

Envision the Two Perfected Ones inscribing my name upon the white tablet, binding my record within the blue-script scroll, and presenting my inscribed tablet to the Overseer of Perfected Beings and the Left Scribe of Destined Records. Let it be submitted to the celestial thrones of the Nine Heavens’ Emperor-Kings and the Seven Sages below, where my name shall be fixed in the register. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals then dissolve into the Grotto Chamber within my body. Proceed to recite the incantation:

"The Primordial Heaven celebrates this auspicious day; the Six Arrays of the Upper Convergence align. The Nine Emperors command their numinosity; the Seven Sages unfold the Perfected. The Register of the Empty Mystery is recorded; the Eastern Florescence binds the scroll. My name is engraved upon the Emperor’s tablet, eternally safeguarding my ascent as an Upper Immortal. Sound and harmony unite; my body becomes natural. The Purple Womb and Jade Essence flourish; the inner brilliance of jade and coral shines forth. My countenance radiates golden splendor; my bones transform like silver. Wondrous hairs of rare hues entwine above and below. The Mystic descends from the Nine Heavens; I turn the Purple Chariot of Heaven. The Six Directions and Five Dragons ascend to the Emperor’s dawn. The Three Origins converge in celebration; may all be as spoken."

Upon completion, bow seven times to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths of qi to conclude. Practicing this for seven years, the Perfected Ones shall manifest in form, personally inscribing one’s name in the register. The Three Origins descend, enabling one to tread the Void and ascend to the Upper Clarity.

The Highest Sacred Emperor states: The method for engraving one’s name upon the Mystic Register of Stone and turning the Nine Heavens is as follows. At the time of celestial convergence on the fifth day of the fifth month, bathe and purify oneself in fasting. At noon, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times to the north, paying homage to the Jade Heaven. After completing the rites, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the chamber filled with resplendent cinnabar clouds enveloping the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the cinnabar clouds, clad in soaring azure feathered robes, crowned with jade diadems that reach the heavens, each holding a register inscribed in blue script. Visualize the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals wearing a cloud-brocade robe, crowned with a seven-jeweled jade coronet, and holding a white silver tablet.

Envision the Two Perfected Ones inscribing my name upon the white tablet, binding my record within the blue-script scroll, and presenting my inscribed tablet to the Overseer of Perfected Beings and the Left Scribe of Destined Records. Let it be submitted to the celestial thrones of the Nine Heavens’ Emperor-Kings and the Seven Sages below, where my name shall be fixed in the register. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals then dissolve into the Crimson Palace within my body. Proceed to recite the incantation:

"The Vermilion Brilliance of the Southern Cinnabar converges with the Upper Yang. The Primordial Heaven exchanges its meeting; the Six Aspirations flourish within. The Nine Perfected and Seven Sages unite in numinous splendor within the Jade Hall. Above, the Mystic Tablet is engraved; the Western Tone binds the scroll. The correct sound is inscribed; clarity pervades the Four Directions. The cinnabar clouds turn the Heavens; descending, they enter my chamber. Soaring azure feathered banners gleam with radiant light. To my left, I rein the Vermilion Phoenix; to my right, I guide the roaming dragon. The Six Reins rise as one; I transcend to the Flowery Hall. The Five Elders bear the contract; the Four Poles stand in pairs. Eternally safeguarding the Mystic Radiance, I share the same visage as the sun and moon."

Upon completion, bow seven times to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths of qi to conclude. Practicing this for seven years, one’s name as an adept of the Mystic Register shall be fixed in the Upper Palace, reflecting and ascending into the Formless.

The Highest Sacred Emperor-Lord states: The method for inscribing one’s name upon the Mountain of the Western Tortoise and ascending in form to the Sevenfold Radiance Chamber is as follows. At the time of celestial convergence on the seventh day of the seventh month, bathe and purify oneself in fasting. At the hour of the evening meal, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times to the north, paying homage to the Jade Heaven. After completing the rites, face north, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the chamber filled with pristine white clouds, ethereally luxuriant and enveloping the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the white clouds, clad in soaring azure feathered robes, crowned with jade diadems that reach the heavens, each holding a register inscribed in blue script. Visualize the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals wearing a cloud-brocade robe, crowned with a seven-jeweled jade coronet, and holding a white silver tablet.

Envision the Two Perfected Ones inscribing my name upon the white tablet, binding my record within the blue-script scroll, and presenting my inscribed tablet to the Overseer of Perfected Beings and the Left Scribe of Destined Records. Let it be submitted to the celestial thrones of the Nine Heavens’ Emperor-Kings and the Seven Sages below, where my name shall be fixed in the register. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Jade Gentleman of the Leading Immortals then dissolve into the Palace of Grand Simplicity within my body. Proceed to intone the prayer:

"Heaven’s celebration descends universally; the Upper Convergence unites the myriad spirits. The Great White records my name; the Eastern Florescence engraves the scroll. Bound with the blue register, inscribed upon the white silver tablet, the Four Tones unite as one; the harmonious sound achieves Perfection. The Highest Sacred grants the Mystic Transmission to deliver my body. The Two Qi descend to stabilize; the Nine Heavens turn in smoke. Transformed into an Immortal Lord, the Jade Gentleman joins the Perfected. The Eight Radiances bear the contract; I ascend to the Emperor’s dawn. Paying homage to the Upper Sages, fortune and blessing entwine ninefold. Eternally safeguarding the Three Radiances, I share the same lifespan as Heaven and Earth."

Upon completion, perform seven prostrations to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths to conclude. Practicing this Way for seven years, the Turtle Mother inscribes the register, the Eastern Florescence records the name, and the Three Origins descend, ascending to the Purple Court.

The Highest Sacred Emperor Lord declares: To inscribe your name in the Golden Gate Palace and ascend beyond the Nine Heavens, you must, at the hour of Upper Convergence on the ninth day of the ninth month, bathe in purity and fast. After sunset, enter the chamber, burn incense, and face north to perform nine prostrations, paying homage to the Jade Heaven. Upon completion, face north, click your teeth twelve times, and visualize within the chamber a yellow cloud, dense and filling the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the yellow cloud, draped in flying azure robes, crowned with the Heaven-Piercing Jade Diadem, each holding a register of azure script. Visualize the Leader of Immortal Jade Lads clad in a robe of yellow brocade, crowned with the Seven-Treasure Jade Diadem, holding a white silver tablet. See the Two Perfected inscribe your name upon the white tablet and bind the register with the azure script. Present your tablet and register to the Inspector of Perfected, who stabilizes the record with the Left Immortal, then inscribe them above before the Seven Sages of the Nine Heavenly Emperor Kings to finalize the name. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Leader of Immortal Jade Lads transform and enter your Yellow Court, whereupon you intone the prayer:

"The Upper Convergence dawns; the Six Celebrations unfold in secrecy. The Nine Perfected reflect and mirror; the Seven Sages decree the day. The Heavenly Immortals stabilize the register; the Five Elders engrave the tablet. The Mystic Record inscribes my name, allowing me to join the assembly. The Nine Heavens turn above; they descend into my chamber. They awaken my natural essence, refine my form and substance, reverse decay to preserve my years, and fill my golden countenance to overflowing. I attain the flying chariot and ascend to the Emperor Unity."

Upon completion, perform seven prostrations to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths to conclude. Practicing this Way, the Five Elders inscribe your name in the Golden Gate, the Three Origins bestow their transmission upon the Purple Chariot, and after seven years, you ride the void to fly upward to the Jade Emperor’s Court.

The Highest Sacred Emperor Lord declares: To inscribe your name in the Azure Florescence Palace, record it in the offices of all directions, ascend beyond the Nine Heavens, and wander freely into the Great Existence, you must, at the hour of Upper Convergence on the eleventh day of the eleventh month, bathe in purity and fast. At midnight, enter the chamber, burn incense, and face north to perform nine prostrations, paying homage to the Jade Heaven. Upon completion, face north, click your teeth twelve times, and visualize within the chamber five-colored clouds, lush and filling the room. Envision the Five Elder Immortal Lords within the five-colored clouds, draped in flying azure robes, crowned with the Heaven-Piercing Jade Diadem, each holding a register of azure script. Visualize the Leader of Immortal Jade Lads clad in a robe of cloud brocade, crowned with the Seven-Treasure Jade Diadem, holding a white silver tablet. See the Two Perfected inscribe your name upon the white tablet and bind the register with the azure script. Present your tablet and register to the Inspector of Perfected, who stabilizes the record with the Left Immortal, then inscribe them above before the Seven Sages of the Nine Heavenly Emperor Kings to finalize the name. The Five Elder Immortal Lords and the Leader of Immortal Jade Lads transform and enter your Gate of Destiny, whereupon you intone the prayer:

"The Great Convergence of Heaven’s Origin unfolds universal celebration; the Three Origins rejoice, and the Nine Emperors unite in countenance. The Highest Sacred monitors the numinous; the myriad immortals all pay reverence. The Five Emperors stabilize the register; the Four Offices guard the chambers. My name is engraved upon the jade tablet and recorded in the Upper Palace. Protected by the Mystic Above, my body enters the void. Above, I transform; below, I transmute, traversing the seventy-four directions. I wander freely in the numinous abode, reining in the radiant hall. Eternally safeguarding Heaven and Earth, I endure with the kalpas. The Seven Origins share a root; the Two Radiant Ones shine as one. The Six Harmonies and Five Aspirations—behold, I am an Immortal King."

Upon completion, perform seven prostrations to the Seven Sages and swallow seven breaths to conclude. Practicing this Way, the Eastern Florescence inscribes your name in all directions, the Five Elders record your name in the Three Origins, the Five Emperor Lords distinguish your right, the Four Perfected descend into your chambers, and after seven years of flight, you ascend to the Emperor’s Hall.

The Highest Sacred Emperor Lord declares: These are the times of the Six Harmonies, the days when the Heavenly Perfected engrave the tablets and stabilize the registers. Below, in all renowned mountains, the Four Offices and Five Emperors select and examine the mystic names, ensuring they are recorded in the Mystic Register. All names are inscribed in reverse, their ranks corresponding to Immortal Ministers. On the appointed days, perform the rites, burn incense, and with focused intention, visualize and intone the prayer. Above, the divine Perfected are moved. After seven years, the Supreme Emperor commands the Four Poles Perfected Ones to descend into your body, bestowing upon you the true scriptures, treasure formulas, and the secret of ascending to the void in broad daylight.

**The Hidden Name Inner Text of Attaining the Dao in the Highest Sacred Mystic Register, Upper Chapter**

The Highest Sacred Jade Emperor Lord arrays the Upper Chapter of the Mystic Register, saying:
Pure countenance inwardly forms, radiance outwardly fresh,
Eternal lamp illumines the chamber, forever hanging in Heaven.
The Morning Lord wanders west through the Sun Gate,
Only to see the Northern Pillar facing the Heavenly Pass.
Within the hall, the Purple Guest and Jade Worthy Lord,
Three and five reside above, flanking the One Origin.
Stand and seek the essence of the sun, halt the soul of the moon,
If you contract and unite, you harmonize with the Mystic Script.
Mushroom blossoms vast, grasses and impurities tangled,
Condensed frost descends, withering the flourishing flowers.
The twenty-seven numbers harmonize in perfect roundness,
Double suns layer their light, illuminating the heavens’ edge.
The Red Dragon governs the world—this is where the Dao divides,
If you comprehend its secret, you ascend the Nine Clouds.
The Four Poles descend to bestow the Numinous Scripture,
Granting feathered robes and flying azure skirts.
Riding the void, you urge the ethereal to the Golden Gate,
This Dao is profound and wondrous—guard it well, do not transmit it.
Calamity will destroy your body and the Seven Mysteries,
Later students with destiny, heed these words.

**The Highest Sacred Supreme Dao Lord arrays the Upper Chapter of the Mystic Register, saying:**
The sun hangs its light, illuminating the human mountain,
Eternally vast, stretching boundlessly to connect with Heaven.
High peaks plant love, forming fresh radiance,
In the eighth month, feathered robes soar to the heavens.
Already, eight persons harmonize with the spoken rhyme,
Two eights join with fire to blend with smoke.
The person stands to the left, reverent yet not subservient,
Having severed all lineage, one becomes kin.
Two mouths divide the sun, merging with the body,
The numinous spring flows left to irrigate the rice field.
From beneath Lü’s rock to the mighty Qin,
The cloud-borne child wears a plain silk kerchief.
Jade pendants unite with treasures, azure skirts of radiance,
Attaining the Dao swiftly, you inherit the Tang years.
Azure qi governs and propagates—our Dao is proclaimed,
Those who obtain its secret serve the Sacred Lord.

Riding the void, steering emptiness to ascend the Nine Mysteries,
One knows the mysterious records inscribed on white slips—
Their methods are secret treasures; those who behold them become immortals.

The Supreme Sage, the Purple Clarity, the Three Primordials of Great Simplicity,
in the *Upper Scroll of the Mysterious Record*, states:
At the end of the Three and Five, the Dao sank into obscurity,
Yet within the gate there was one named Guanyin.
Mouth sealed, silent through ancient and modern ages,
How deep is the cavern within the hollow vastness?
Craft not of divine artisanship bears the weight of human hearts;
A lone carriage, losing its way, ascends the mountain forests.
Dark trees flourish, lush with yang’s verdant shade—
What do I seek? Below the mountain, a chant arises.
One clod of earth joins the mysterious, grasping the notes of gong and shang,
Donning coarse robes, chanting scriptures, tending the numinous lapel.
White jade towers, towering above cloud-wreathed peaks,
Ten measures of destiny’s reckoning vie in strength.
Whistling through teeth to summon spirits, harmonizing with jade tones,
Gazing with the moon, they await the ascent to gold.
The August Emperor’s Eight Perfected arrive to rely upon,
The White Emperor circulates qi—our Dao is renewed.
Names inscribed on purple slips, attaining its scroll,
The Western Tortoise confirms the record—you are ranked among the Perfected.
Inverse annotations of the Mysterious Record align with nature;
Beware of reckless disclosure, lest the Dao dissolve into nothingness.
This is called the Dharma Drum, assembling the host of spirits.

The Supreme Sage, the White Jade Tortoise Terrace, the Nine Numinous Perfected,
the Grand Realized One of the West, the Queen Mother,
in the *Upper Scroll of the Mysterious Record*, states:
In the highest antiquity, bows were drawn long,
A man stood to the left, intent on strength alone.
White slips and mysterious records soar like grass in flight—
Ten mouths study the Dao, yet lack provisions.
Below the mountain, they feed on beans, surpassing ten flourishing years;
Three forces unite in heart—you, the shepherd.
Sun and moon ride forth, the four limbs grow strong,
One scholar, two blades, together in the four directions.
A thousand disciples unite in perfection; eight come to welcome,
A girl of the North Pole wears a kerchief upon her head.
Pledging with the moon, she gives birth to cloud blossoms;
After the dragon’s flight, the Dao shall prevail.
You must mend the Upper Palace with the Mysterious Record,
Your name inscribed in the Azure Register, ascending the Western Hall.
Having obtained its secret, you ride the void in flight,
Roaming the eight poles—joy unending.
If you possess this text, conceal it deeply;
Test it across the four extremes, inscribing it in all directions.
Inverse annotations of the Mysterious Slips in the Eastern Florescence Palace—
Within seven years, they shall come as promised.

The Supreme Sage, the Central Yellow Elder Lord,
in the *Upper Scroll of the Mysterious Record*, states:
In the Upper Primordial, there is the True One, the mysterious qi—
Who guards it? The moon’s own person.
Without learning others, one encounters a worthy,
Vowing faith, receiving and embracing its essential words.
Swiftly reining through the nine skies, one suddenly attains the real;
Cinnabar jade cradles treasures, their radiance fresh.
Green grasses flourish, seated in the cinnabar field,
The sun’s essence in the belt, beside the red stone.
Before the flourishing of the primordial, ascending the Three Heavens,
Metal and wood yield—this person is chosen.
Each diligently seeks the root of the Dao,
Striving to behold the Mysterious Record and the Numinous Scroll.
Having obtained the white slips and the Azure Register’s text,
The four extremes descend to confer upon you the real.
Riding the void in flight, ascending the Nine Mysteries,
Lightly transmitting or recklessly divulging leads to the dark springs.
Forever bound to ghostly servitude, one attains no immortality.

The Supreme Sage, the Great Thearch of Fusang,
in the *Upper Scroll of the Mysterious Record*, states:
The Purple Void’s Jade Pavilion, borne by plain silk,
Only the August One’s heart keeps the tryst.
After Zhou, in the fields, a child—
The moon illuminates the secluded valley, ascending the high terrace.
Surveying the eight poles, beholding the crimson essence,
Contemplating the subtle and profound, two stand as one.
Bowing and rising, seeking the real, the hands grow light;
Obtaining the Dao’s precious secret, the head and body quicken.
To the north, the Upper Perfected; to the south, peace—
Where do they abide? In the mysterious watchtower, awaiting the lofty numinous.
Ten disciples, eight fruits, assist our scripture;
When the Golden Monarch comes, the Dao’s governance is pure.
Scholars diligently contemplate, seeking its name,
Striving to inscribe jade slips, summoning purple chariots.
The Three Primordials visit the chamber to confer the true scripture;
At dawn, knowing the Mysterious Record, one ascends the Three Clarities.
Soaring through the mysterious void, ascending the Thearch’s court,
Deeply concealing the precious secret, one attains immortality.
Reckless disclosure or light transmission erases your form,
Dying, you fill the ranks of lower ghosts, completing the kalpa’s span.

The Later Sage, the Thearch of the Golden Watchtower,
in the *Upper Scroll of the Mysterious Record*, states:
The Nine-One’s script is hard to hear,
South of the mound, its name is easily known.
You must refine nine times with golden essence,
Within the round mouth, light extends and brightens.
Guarding the primordial for two days, beholding the true form,
Emerald stones fall, falling—born amid humanity.
Below the ears, jade hangs; the mouth chants scriptures,
Green grasses flourish, winter and summer in bloom.
Plain silk knots the three hearts as one,
The August Elder shines brilliantly in the sun’s court.
The Highest Perfected knock upon jade chimes,
Through ten thousand kalpas, they become infants.
Fine trees, dense and lush, plant long life,
Two chariots, feathered, sprinkle the eight darknesses.
Sixty jade maidens attend your form,
The Straddling Constellation enters Lü, aiding the blades of war.
The Crimson Child roams, the Six States at peace,
The reckoning of the four directions—ten thousand spirits.
Inscribing jade slips to mend the Upper Clarity,
After the ren-chen year, the Dao’s governance is bright.
There must be those of prior wisdom who obtain this scripture,
Destined to be humanity’s patriarchs, diligent in the slips.
Ten tens and five fives, binding brothers,
Ascending the mountain to pledge oaths, arrayed in the Florescence of Hua.
Having obtained this resonance, inscribe the mysterious name—
The Three Primordials descend, sending green chariots.
The bow-mouthed one emerges to govern, serving the Hua Court;
At this time, joy is unending.

The Most High Sage Emperor says: The Supreme receives the qi of the Nine Mysteries, arraying the ten thousand perfected, the thirty-nine emperors, and the twenty-four Jade Sovereigns to govern the Upper Clarity’s palaces. Dispersing qi and scattering numinous power, they oversee all within the Mysterious Void of the myriad people, inscribing white slips for two hundred forty thousand who are destined to attain the Dao. Later students who encounter this text, whose names harmonize with its rhythm, may ascend to become perfected immortals.

After the ren-chen year, the Ultimate Dao shall prevail. The Great Emperor of Fusang will then dispatch the Four Poles Perfected to survey the world below, traversing all renowned mountains within the Six Directions. They shall command the divine officials of the Five Emperors to examine and select those whose mysterious names align with the true, bestowing upon them the precious oral instructions to serve as patriarchs and teachers. Those chosen for their bone-nature and named bodies shall ascend mountains to pledge oaths, arrayed before the Azure Palace, where they shall receive the binding sash and transmitted words.

When the Wood Mansion of Supreme Peace emerges to govern in the mao year, the knots of Meng Ford shall be untied, and a petition shall be presented to welcome the Sage Lord into the Upper Clarity’s palace. Without a mysterious name, one may not partake in the upper chapters. Those who obtain it shall have their allotment fixed upon the white slips, diligently cultivating rigorous practices, maintaining long fasts, and contemplating the true for seven years—then shall numinous portents descend, awakening the adept’s spirit and perfection. Thus shall they become the teachers and patriarchs of all students. Without this endowment, none may attain it.

Should one dare to pry, lightly divulge, or recklessly proclaim these mysteries, their seven generations of ancestors shall bear the burden of guilt, and they themselves shall tread upon the Mountain of Knives to forfeit their lives, forever barred from the River’s Source, denied entry into immortality.

**The Hidden Writ of Golden Names and Jade Scripts**
The August Sage Lord declares: Within the Golden Pavilion lies the Hidden Writ of Jade Names. Those who comprehend it shall ascend to the Golden Palace, soaring in radiance to the Upper Clarity. Whoever bears it shall have their name inscribed in golden script upon jade tablets, with the numinous immortals of the Four Seas and Five Peaks escorting and guarding them. After nine years, they shall ride flying clouds and command twelve jade maidens.

*Written in cinnabar on white silk.*

**The Upper Clarity’s Golden Script and Jade Register**
The August Sage Lord declares: The Upper Clarity’s Golden Script and Jade Register contain the supreme writ. Those who comprehend it shall ascend to the Upper Clarity, their rank equal to the Four Perfected. Whoever bears it shall have their name inscribed in the Upper Clarity’s script upon golden tablets, with divine immortals descending from the Five Peaks to welcome them with the attendants of transcendence.

*Written in azure on white silk.*

**The White Tablet of the Supreme Ultimate with Azure Script**
The August Sage Lord declares: The White Tablet of the Supreme Ultimate bears azure script. Whoever bears it shall have their name inscribed upon the tablet by the Supreme Ultimate, recorded among the divine immortals, with the Four Poles providing protection. After nine years, they shall traverse the skies in flight.

*Written in azure on white silk.*
